TunableEnum.description: The cas part type to be mapped.

Tunable.description: The CAS part to use by default for this body type.

Tunable.name: ShouldSkipForMannequin
Tunable.description: Defines whether the BodyType should be skipped altogether when rendering a thumbnail for a mannequin.

TunableList.name: ThumbBodyTypeMap
TunableList.description: When rendering a thumbnail for a specific BodyType listed here, then instead of using the DefaultPart, we may instead want to use the MatchingPart specified here, or skip the part altogether.

TunableEnum.name: BodyType
TunableEnum.description: The cas part type to be mapped.

Tunable.name: MatchingPart
Tunable.description: The CAS part to use instead of the DefaultPart when rendering a thumbnail for the specified Thumbnail BodyType.

Tunable.name: ShouldSkip
Tunable.description: Defines whether the BodyType should be skipped altogether when rendering a thumbnail for the specified Thumbnail BodyType
